content.raw: If the model is inserted from the left panel, it is many meters high on the Z direction. Then if you try to insert another model on top of it, the model is inserted below it. Consider giving it a negative Z offset so the streets roughly match Z == 0.
content.html: If the model is inserted from the left panel, it is many meters high on the Z direction. Then if you try to insert another model on top of it, the model is inserted below it. Consider giving it a negative Z offset so the streets roughly match Z == 0.
